cause.description:
One Voice Journal is a human rights publication that informs people about the the human rights violations that are taking place throughout the world by interviewing those who are directly affected by these tragedies. If you would like to become a part of this mission please email onevoice@onevoicejournal.org
1. To create awareness about Human Rights Violations
2. To give a voice to those oppressed throughout the world
cause.mission: To create awareness about Human Rights Violations
cause.name: Human Rights - One Voice Journal
